job.title: Network Engineer
job.description: <p>A permanent/direct-hire <strong>Network Engineer</strong> position is available with an IT organization located in Roseville, CA. Only local candidates are currently being considered. </p><p><br></p><p>Essential Duties and Responsibilities:</p><ul><li>Designing and implementing new network solutions and/or improving the efficiency of current networks</li><li>Installing, configuring, and supporting network equipment including routers, proxy servers, switches, WAN accelerators, DNS and DHCP</li><li>Configuring firewalls, routing, and switching to maximize network efficiency and security</li><li>Maximizing network performance through ongoing monitoring and troubleshooting</li><li>Arranging scheduled upgrades</li><li>Investigating faults in the network</li><li>Updating network equipment to the latest firmware releases</li><li>Reporting network status to key stakeholders</li><li>Support services for: Microsoft related technologies: Windows Server, Exchange, SQL, O365, etc.; Virtualization technologies: VMware and Hyper-V; Remote access solutions: Fortinet VPN, Duo; DHCP and DNS; Security Suite: FortiNet, Carbon Black, MimeCast</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Knowledge, Skills, and/or Abilities Required: </p><ul><li>3+ years’ experience with Networking and Security</li><li>Interpersonal skills: such as telephony skills, communication skills, active listening and customer-care</li><li>Ability to multi-task and adapt to changes quickly</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Apply now!</p>
